properties.Name: Jinguji Home
properties.Source: Masaye Jinguji Interview, Morrison (1993) p58: 1728 Fawcett
properties.Notes: Masaye says it was across the street from the Tofu Store on 1131 Market St

properties.Name: New Tacoma Hotel, Watanabe Dentist Office, and Warashima Dentist Office
properties.Source: Morrison (1993) p56, Ito (1926), Ryo Munekata Interview, 1929 Polk's City Directory p867
properties.Notes: 'We moved to another hotel between 13th and 15th on Broadway, Called the New Tacoma Hotel, which is directly across the street from the present Sheraton Hotel'-Ryo Munekata

properties.Name: Kawano Home
properties.Notes: 'And I had, grew up with, uh, five broth-, five siblings. It was really six, but one little girl died when I was only an infant. So there were five children, three boys and two girls. Uh, three girls and two boys. And a mother and father.' -Harue Kawano, March 11, 2005

properties.Name: Mieko Home
properties.Notes: Morrison (1993) on p59 lists the Omori Home

properties.Name: St Paul Lumber Company House 11
properties.Notes: At a different time, the family lived in house 14.
